To retrieve a list of the user's strean account details, make a GET call using basic authentication.

====URL:====
http://sendible.com/api/v1/stream-accounts.format

====Formats:====
Replace {{{format}}} with either {{{xml}}} or {{{json}}}

====HTTP Methods:====
GET

====Parameters:====
 * {{{application_id}}}: Your application id from http://sendible.com/developers.

====Authentication:====
Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user.

====Success Response:====
{{{
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<accounts type="array">
  <account>
    <id type="integer">23887125</id>
    <username>Sendible</username>
    <service>
      <id type="integer">1495</id>
      <icon>http://twitter.com/phoenix/favicon.ico</icon>
      <description>Monitor Twitter for search terms.</description>
      <title>Twitter Search</title>
    </service>
  </account>
</accounts>
}}}

====Error Response:====
{{{
<error>
<type>InvalidUsernamePassword</type>
<message>Username/password is invalid.</message>
</error>
}}}
